text: Ezɨ Devit kamaghɨn Joap uan mɨdorozir gumaziba ko me mɨgei, “Ia uan korotiaba abighɨva, azirakar korotiabar aghuigh, egh ia Apner bagh azi.” Me Hebronɨn anefa. Dughiar me Apnerɨn kuam inigha gumazir kuaba afir danganimɨn zuima, Devit Apnerɨn akuriamɨn gɨrara zui. Devit gumazamiziba ko me mozimɨn boroghɨn tuivighav ikia, bar moghɨra puvɨram azi.
